sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_vote ( id char(32) not null, votemark int not null, text varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, expireddate datetime, status tinyint not null, groups bit not null, anonymous bit not null, logging bit not null, multiple tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );
create table sf_voter ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, contentid) );

create table sf_vote_group ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, multiple tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_vote_item ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, groupid char(32), text varchar(32) not null, votes int not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, groupid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_vote_log ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, itemid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32), ip varchar(32), primary key(id), unique(itemid, userid) );
